Others: The India Vs South Africa T20 match will be played on Sunday, 30 October 2022 at Optus Stadium, Australia.
India is on the top of the ICC T20 Group 2 points table with 4 points after winning two matches - against Pakistan and the Netherlands.
The live telecast of India vs South Africa T20 will be available on Star Sports Network and viewers can also enjoy the live streaming on the Disney+ Hotstar app.
